dct_title_s: Staten Island : If you haven't seen Staten Island, you haven't really seen New York! / NYC & Company Convention & Visitors Bureau Major Events & Promotions ; text by Dan Icolari ; design by Mary Chapman ; map illustration by Susan McDermott. (Index)
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Includes indexed sites of interest, color illustrations, and business advertisements.
dct_publisher_sm: New York : Council on the Arts & Humanities for Staten Island ; ©2004.
